messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Video rental site?  which is the best site?
messages.msgSnippet: www.netflix.com Ikatae@aol.com wrote:What is the best online video rental site?  One where we could rent Discovery, National Geographic, PBS Series, etc. as
messages.messageBody:
www.netflix.com

Ikatae@... wrote:What is the best online video rental site? One where we could rent
Discovery, National Geographic, PBS Series, etc. as well as regular movies and maybe
even video games. We signed up for DVD Avanue - but they don't have much to
choose from except hit movies. We also like foreign movies and more obscure
movies. thanks, Connie

messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Video rental site?  which is the best site?
messages.messageBody:
<< What is the best online video rental site? One where we could rent
Discovery, National Geographic, PBS Series, etc. as well as regular movies
and maybe
even video games. >>

Not video games, but we've used Netflix for quite a while (two years maybe? a
little less?). It's only U.S., not Canada or otherwhere. Here's a dump of
a documentaries page that lists their subcategories of documentaris and has
their currently most popular rentals (of documentaries). (I hope the
formatting isn't a big mess, but if it is maybe you can go to netflix.com and look.

messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Video rental site?  which is the best site?
messages.msgSnippet: We use (and LOVE) Netflix.  www.netflix.com  That covers everything you mentioned except the video games, but I ve heard that www.gamefly.com was great for
messages.messageBody:
We use (and LOVE) Netflix. www.netflix.com That covers everything you
mentioned except the video games, but I've heard that www.gamefly.com
was great for that. HTH
-Tracy-

On Jul 1, 2004, at 9:05 AM, Ikatae@... wrote:

> What is the best online video rental site? One where we could rent
> Discovery, National Geographic, PBS Series, etc. as well as regular
> movies and maybe even video games. We signed up for DVD Avanue - but
> they don't have much to choose from except hit movies. We also like
> foreign movies and more obscure movies.
>

messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Video rental site?  which is the best site?
messages.msgSnippet: We use Netflick Pam ... From: UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com Date: 07/01/04 10:47:11 To: UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com Subject:
messages.messageBody:
We use Netflick

Pam

-------Original Message-------

From: UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com
Date: 07/01/04 10:47:11
To: UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Video rental site? which is the best site?

What is the best online video rental site? One where we could rent
Discovery, National Geographic, PBS Series, etc. as well as regular movies
and maybe
even video games. We signed up for DVD Avanue - but they don't have much
to
choose from except hit movies. We also like foreign movies and more
obscure
movies. thanks, Connie

messages.subject: Video rental site?  which is the best site?
messages.msgSnippet: What is the best online video rental site?  One where we could rent Discovery, National Geographic, PBS Series, etc. as well as regular movies and  maybe even
messages.messageBody:
What is the best online video rental site? One where we could rent
Discovery, National Geographic, PBS Series, etc. as well as regular movies and maybe
even video games. We signed up for DVD Avanue - but they don't have much to
choose from except hit movies. We also like foreign movies and more obscure
movies. thanks, Connie
